articles.title: In Heart-Stopping Video, Delta And American Eagle Planes Nearly Collide Mid-Air - NDTV
articles.description: A dash camera from a North Syracuse Police Department patrol car captured the near in-air collision late morning on Monday, July 8.
articles.content:
The footage reveals the paths of the planes crossing, appearing to almost collide.
A dramatic video has captured the moment two planes from major commercial airlines appeared to nearly collide mid-a… [+2125 chars]
